Mobstr felt someone's teeth sink in his left shoulder. He raised his right
arm and punched away at Necromancer's head...

----- Original Message -----
From: <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2001 12:33 AM
Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster


> Mobster use a tackle attack (Oh sorry wrong game.)
>
> Necromancer was taken to the ground by Mobsters attack, the ground
> shook as the titans wrested in the dirt. The momentum sent them
> rolling across the ground like a couple of schoolkids fighting on the
> playground. Necromancer sent his head forward snapping his jaws at
> the enemy bot trying to bite him in the left shoulder.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Mobster is hit and stunned, and then hit by every fireball. It
> angered him
> > to the point of no return. He charged Necromancer, lunging to knock
> him
> > over...
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2001 12:13 AM
> > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> >
> >
> > > Necromancer spins aroud when mobster pushes the tail away. He
> spreads
> > > his wings and swings them at Mobster. knowing that he's open for
> an
> > > attack he launches a series of six fireballs at the giant.
> starting
> > > with a shot at mobsters left arm he moves to the right shoulder
> and
> > > continues to alternate.
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: Just regular round lasers.
> > > >
> > > > BIC: Mobster moves his hands up and catches the tail, pushing
> the
> > > tail, hopefully out of the way...
> > > >   ----- Original Message -----
> > > >   From: CYBERWOLF4
> > > >   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > > >   Sent: Sunday, January 07, 2001 11:00 AM
> > > >   Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >   (What did he fire?  Is he still using his flamethrower?)
> > > >
> > > >   Necromancer continued to let his wings take the abuse, he rose
> > > his left wing up and blocked the shot. stress fractures continued
> to
> > > form as the abuse continued to take its tole. as he blocked he
> swung
> > > his tale around at Mobsters head.
> > > >     ----- Original Message -----
> > > >     From: SOULSTICE
> > > >     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > > >     Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 3:39 PM
> > > >     Subject: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >     Mobster seen the ice blast coming, since this enemy has been
> > > firing them alot indeed. Mobster aimed Grenade's flamethrower, and
> > > managed to destroy the ice ball with it. Then the fireballs came.
> > > Mobster tried to switch to Kracken's ice gun, but too late, bang!
> > > Mobster slaps at himself to put the fire out. It does in fact,
> > > though, start to defrost his arm. Was he working on Gigas' brain?
> He
> > > must have been! He fired the flamethrower at his arm and melted
> the
> > > ice. He took the gun back in his left arm. Horn Drill had been
> known
> > > to be perfect at almost everything. Mobster aimed at Necromancer's
> > > head, and fired...
> > > >       ----- Original Message -----
> > > >       From: CYBERWOLF4
> > > >       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > > >       Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 11:24 AM
> > > >       Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >       Necromacer curled his wings in front of him taking the
> brunt
> > > of Mobsters attack. small cracks began to form where the shots
> > > struck. He roared partly in intimidation and partly in disgust at
> the
> > > Alliance bot before him. he fired an ice blast from his mouth
> > > followed by a fireball out of each nostril.
